column2: "Oh, peon! Did peon come here to investigate too? Huey and I are investigating as well."
"We were ordered to leave Harukotan to avoid agitating the Kuronians. So we came here instead!"
"Well, it's inevitable if you consider how influential we are, yeah! We're definitely not being treated like nuisances!"
"But Casra said \"Go back, you idiots! You're in the way!\"."
"Don't mind him! He's just an awful guy!"
"...He didn't hear that, did he?"
"Can you guys be quiet?"
"Uwah! Wait, it's just you. I just thought it was Casra."
"Don't lump me together with that obnoxious four-eyes."
"...Ah. You're... Claris Claes."
"Who are you? Have we met before?"
"But, why do I get this nostalgic feeling?"
"I'm sorry! I've just remembered there's something I need to do."
"...Hey Huey, have I done something bad to her before?"
"Don't worry, Claris Claes. Both you and her have done nothing wrong."
"I'm sorry. Even though I said I'm fine... I'm pathetic, aren't I?"
"1. As I thought, Claris Claes is..."
"2. Don't worry about it"
"Yes. She was created based on me. Even her hair color is the same as mine before it turned grey."
"That's what I told myself. But, as I thought, it's impossible."
"She was created based on me. Even her hair color, it's the same as mine before it was gone."
"I am willing to accept all of the misfortune that comes my way."
"However, because of me, she was born into this cruel world to suffer. When I think of that, I just..."
"She, no, they were created just to be used as tools. To suffer, and to be cast aside."
"All this, just because I fell for Luther's lies."
